    • Method Detail

      • propagate

        public void propagate(byte[] data,
             int uid,
             Trace trace)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: RMINode
        this methods propagate data to its successors. If trace parameter is not null, he add itself into it before transmit it to its successors. the uid parameter is used to recognize the message. this can be usefull is cycles are present in the network
        Specified by:
        propagate in interface RMINode
        Parameters:
        data - is an array of byte which contains the data to transfer
        uid - is an unique identifier for the message
        trace - is the node history in which the propagation pass through
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
